description: On sun-baked hikes along exposed trails with no hope of shade, the High Coast Shade Jacket is perfect as an airy protective garment. It will protect against the sun without letting you overheat, and takes up minimum space in your backpack. Made from light well-ventilated G-1000 Air Stretch in recycled polyester and organic cotton. Two hand pockets and a comfortable hood that protects from the sun’s rays.
name: Fjallraven High Coast Shade Jacket - Mens
